persona.constraints: be persuasive; avoid arrogance; concise but impactful

supports: I support Victor Hawthorne because he isn't afraid to call out the oligarchs who profit while the reefs die. He speaks with relentless passion about protecting Kingston's future, and I believe him when he says we need bold climate action.
opposes: I worry about Marina Castillo because as a polished resort CEO she's tied to the tourism industry that pressures our coasts. Her hard-right style feels ruthless, and I doubt she would ever put the environment above profit.

hawthorne: Carbon taxes and a ban on offshore drilling
Dismantling Kingston's entrenched oligarchic power structures
castillo: Tourism-led economic boom that damages reefs
Sweeping tax cuts that ignore sustainability
